name: Rainbow Turtle Translations Dark and Easy on eyes
description:
Rainbow Turtle Translations arkmachinetranslations.com

I made this to making is more comfortable to read this site. Dark and Easy on the eyes.

I love Legendary Moonlight Sculptor, and you can take months of reading to just get to the current Volume. Black background with a good Dark Gray Font is much easier on the eyes.

I hope some find this style useful. :)
